file_content.text: It'll probably take me months to decipher these artifacts. Can't wait to get started.
I'm dying to know what the Republic found out there.
Have you been to the starship graveyard yet? Fascinating place. Discoveries left and right.
You couldn't drag me away from this planet.
Just yesterday I saw the Dauntless Star--Republic cruiser, classic Mon Cal design. Beautiful wreckage.
Finally! The suspense has been killing me. Let me take a look...
Shot down over sixty Imperial fighters. You can still feel the heat wafting off those old cannons.
We've been trying to lure the Jedi into action for months. Haven't heard from them. Until now.
I don't believe we've met.
Captain Vujaar, Imperial Reclamation Service. My areas of expertise include military history, antique weaponry and archaeological warfare.
Can you believe they're actually paying me to alphabetize cargo manifests? Feels like robbery.
We're making progress, but it's not all fun and cataloging out there. We think the Republic is onto something. Something big.
Spotted several Jedi Masters and a contingent of Republic commandos heading into the starship graveyard. Led by a former Battlemaster, if you can believe it.
I'm no Jedi expert--yet--but I know Battlemasters train other Jedi, teach them how to fight. Pretty scary with a lightsaber, I'll wager.
What's a Battlemaster?
These--these are Sith! Old, but well preserved. Can just barely make out some text...
Incredible! These belonged to the Sadow'een, Naga Sadow's legendary order of assassins!
You're obsessed.
History lessons bore me.
This is how you use your time?
Come on, where else can you find genuine blast-contact shell casings? That's vintage stuff!
Whatever keeps you smiling.
The Republic wouldn't risk its greatest heroes on just anything. We need to find out what they've discovered and take it for ourselves.
It's possible the Jedi already have what they're looking for. You'll want to be thorough.
Guess not everyone finds historic battle statistics particularly exciting.
You're overreacting.
I'm not so sure. Haven't seen the Republic mobilize like this since... well, ever.
Count me out. [Refuse quest]
You're not even the least bit curious what the Republic is up to?
Jedi? That could be trouble.
Agreed.
Naga Sadow? Who's that?
Ancient Sith Lord. Very powerful. Subject of many interesting tales.
Not interested.
I thought the Sadow'een were just a myth, but this...
I can't be certain, but it appears the Sadow'een constructed several temples across the galaxy. These artifacts point the way.
A very rare find. I can't thank you enough for recovering them.
I'll unravel this mystery.
And watch out for that Battlemaster. He probably knows more about lightsaber combat than anyone in the galaxy. Fair warning.
As long as I can kill Jedi.
An excellent discovery.
Sounds fascinating.
I could go on for hours if you gave me half a reason to.
Mystery solved.
Oh, yes. This is more than we could have hoped for.
